page.title: 07LEISURE IN 1985
page.content: As leisure time increases in the 80s, more time is taken to try and keep fit,espically in the face of increasing heart disease. Many people jog in their spare time or attend classes in keep fit or aerobics.In our class 8 people out of 25 regularly jogged.Others took part in swimming,tennis,football and BMX bicycle racing.Snooker and golf were also very popular.Some children enjoyed reading,or collecting things such as perfume bottles and several people played musical instruments. Nearly everybody watched TV in their spare time,some people only did this. The most popular programme was Dallas, an American soap opera.
